title: When I, The Main Heroine, Died, The Sub-Heroines Got Serious!? - Novel Updates
tags: Dead Protagonist   Death   Death of Loved Ones   Devoted Love Interests   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   First Love   Ghosts   Oneshot   Royalty
author: Anikki Burazza   アニッキーブラッザー
description: I died, and my boyfriend was overwhelmed by sadness. I want him to recover somehow ... but I don't want him to make a new lover right away. And then, my sister, my best friend, my rival, because I'm dead, 'Leave him to me!' Don't say that on your own!??>
